Oscar F. Rogers

  1. Foster Name: Oscar F.
  2. Foster Family: William and Edith Bartsch
  3. Location of Family: Royal, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  5. Arrival Place: Neligh, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 4
  7. Date of Birth: 1902-12-27, Bloomingburg, NY
  8. Date of Death: 1990-06-22
  9. Gender: male
  10. Source: Crossroads April 1991, p. 13; "Riders of the Orphan Trains: Nebraska," http://www.usgennet.org/usa/ne/topic/trains/riders.htm; Mary Ellen Johnson, comp., Orphan Train Riders: Their Own Stories vol. 1 (Baltimore: Gateway Press, 1992), p.155-156; National Orphan Train Complex; Social Security Death Index; 1910 United States Federal Census; Rootsweb; Children of Earl Gregory Miller Sr and Charity Jane Hawley website; Letter to Antelope County Historical Society by C. Lloyd Castner
